1.title: Bellator MMA 85
1.plot: From the Bren Center on the campus of UC Irvine, Featherweight world champion Pat Curran defends his title against explosive knockout artist Patricio Pitbull, while lightweight world champion Michael Chandler battles former Olympian Rick Hawn.

2.title: Bellator MMA 86
2.plot: Live from Winstar World Casino in Thackerville, Oklahoma, Bellator presents Welterweight World Championship: Ben Askren vs. Karl Amoussou; Plus Light Heavyweight Quarterfinal: 'King Mo' Lawal vs. Przemyslaw Mysiala

3.title: Bellator MMA 87
3.plot: Live from Mt. Pleasant, MI Bellator MMA presents Lightweight Tournament Quarterfinals: Guillaume DeLorenzi vs. Patricky Pitbull; Lloyd Woodard vs. Dave Rickels; Thiago Michel vs. Tiger Sarnavskiy

4.title: Bellator MMA 88
4.plot: Bellator features the toughest tournament in sports, an action-packed 12 week, eight-man event culminating with the victor earning the right to fight for coveted world title.

5.plot: Bellator features the toughest tournament in sports, an action-packed 12 week, eight-man event culminating with the victor earning the right to fight for coveted world title.

2.title: Bellator MMA 99
2.plot: Bellator is live in Temecula, California with the featherweight tournament opening round. Also on the card: Patricio Pitbull taking on Diego Nunes and journeyman Vladimir Matyushenko against the dangerous Houston Alexander.

3.title: Bellator MMA 100
3.plot: Bellator is live in Phoenix, Arizona with Ben Saunders and Douglas Lima in a much anticipated rematch for the welterweight tournament final. And the fall welterweight tournament has its opening round featuring War Machine.

4.title: Bellator MMA 101
4.plot: Bellator is live in Portland, Oregon as the stacked lightweight tournament kicks off with MMA veterans Marcus Davis, Rich Clementi, John Alessio, and Tiger Sarnavskiy. Also Cheick Kongo makes his Bellator debut in the heavyweight tournament semifinal.

5.title: Bellator MMA 102
5.plot: Bellator features the toughest tournament in sports, an action-packed 12 week, eight-man event culminating with the victor earning the right to fight for coveted world title.

6.title: Bellator MMA 103
6.plot:

7.title: Bellator MMA 104
7.plot: Bellator is live in Cedar Rapids, Iowa with the Season 9 Welterweight semifinals. Season 6 finalist Rick Hawn looks for another win when he rematches Brent Weedman and the polarizing MMA standout "War Machine" meets Ron Keslar.

8.title: Bellator MMA 105
8.plot: Bellator is live in Albuquerque, New Mexico with the Lightweight tournament semifinals as wrestling standout Will Brooks takes on the heavy handed Saad Awad.

9.title: Bellator MMA 106
9.plot: Bellator is live in Thackerville, Oklahoma with the three tournament final fights. Knockout artist Cheick Kongo meets Peter Graham in the Heavyweight finals. Joe Warren and Travis Marx battle it out in the Bantamweight season finals. And Brennan Ward takes on Mikkel Parlo for the Middleweight tournament crown.

10.title: Bellator MMA 107
10.plot: Bellator is live in Atlantic City, New Jersey with Rampage Jackson making his Bellator debut against slugger Joey Beltran in a headlining feature fight. The heavyweight title is on the line as Champ Alexander Volcov takes on tournament winner Vitaly Minakov. The Featherwight tournament finals are set with newcomer Justin Wilcox and tourney favorite Patricio Pitbull.

11.title: Bellator MMA 108
11.plot: Bellator features the toughest tournament in sports, an action-packed 12 week, eight-man event culminating with the victor earning the right to fight for coveted world title.

1.title: Bellator MMA 110
1.plot: Live from Mohegan Sun Casino in Uncasville, CT, Bellator's Light Heavyweight tournament opening round. Quinton "Rampage" Jackson taking on former champ Christian M'Pumbu. King Mo faces Russian submission ace Mikhail Zayats.

2.title: Bellator MMA 111
2.plot: Bellator is live in Thackerville, Oklahoma with Eduardo Dantas stepping into the cage to put his bantamweight world title on the line in a five round war with Anthony Leone. The card will also feature the heavyweight tourney opening round with top prospects such as Lavar Johnson, Mighty Mo, and Rich Hale.

3.title: Bellator MMA 112
3.plot: Bellator MMA is live from Hammond, Indiana with the Featherweight World Title on the line as Champ Daniel Straus and former Champ Pat Curran meet for a third time to decide who walks away with the title and the trilogy. The season 10 Welterweight Tournament will also kick off with all quarterfinal bouts taking place.

4.title: Bellator MMA 113
4.plot: Bellator MMA is live from Mulvane, Kansas with the Light Heavyweight World Title on the line as Champ Attila Vegh and Interim Champ"The Hardcore Kid" Emanuel Newton meet to decide who the true Light Heavyweight Champion is! The Lightweight Tournament will also kick off with knockout artist Patricky Pitbull taking on Kansas local, David Rickels.

5.title: Bellator MMA 114
5.plot: Bellator MMA is live from Salt Lake City, Utah with the Middleweight World Title as tournament underdog; Brennan Ward meets Champ Alexander Shlemenko. The Featherweight Tournament continues with the semi-finals Desmond Green takes on Will Martinez and Matt Bessete meets Daniel Weichel.

6.title: Bellator MMA 115
6.plot: Bellator MMA is live from Reno, Nevada with the Heavyweight World Title on the line as newly crowned champ Vitaly Minakov takes on tournament winner and knock artist Cheick Kongo. The Welterweight Tournament rolls on with the semi finals featuring Dan Cramer vs Jeremy Kimball and Andrey Koreshkov vs Sam Oropeza.

7.title: Bellator MMA 116
7.plot: Bellator is live from Pechanga Resort & Casino in Temecula, CA as the heavyweight tournament semi finals commence. Also on the card, a light heavyweight feature fight as Joey Beltran squares off against Vladimir Matyushenko.

8.title: Bellator MMA 117
8.plot: Bellator MMA is live from Council Bluffs, Iowa as top contenders Douglas Lima and Rick Hawn clash in a Welterweight Title fight. The Lightweight Semifinals also take place with Patricky Pitbull taking on Derek Campos.

9.title: Bellator MMA 118
9.plot: Bellator MMA is live from Atlantic City, New Jersey with former champ Joe Warren taking on tournament winner Rafael Silva for the Interim Bantamweight title. And Russian phenom Andrey Koreskov will meet Justin Baesman in the Welterweight Tournament Semifinals.

10.title: Bellator MMA 119
10.plot: Bellator MMA is live from Uncasville, Connecticut with the Featherweight World Title on the line as Champion Pat Curran looks to defend his title again against bitter rival Patricio Pitbull.

2.title: Bellator MMA 124
2.plot: Bellator MMA is live from Plymouth, Missouri with the Light Heavyweight World Title on the line as Champ Emanuel Newton takes on journeyman Joey Beltran. Liam McGeary and Kelly Andunson will also square off in a Light Heavyweight showdown to determine the next #1 contender!

3.title: Bellator MMA 125
3.plot: Bellator MMA is live from Fresno, California with a Middleweight barnburner as the heavy-handed Doug Marshall and KO king Melvin Manhoef meet for a sure classic. Rafael Carvalho and Brian Rogers will also square off in a Middleweight showdown.

4.title: Bellator MMA 126
4.plot: Bellator MMA is live from Phoenix, Arizona with the Middleweight title on the line as long-time Champ Alexander Shlemenko puts his belt on the line against undefeated Brandon Halsey. And the Lightweight tournament final is up for grabs as Patricky Pitbull faces submission ace Marcin Held

5.title: Bellator MMA 127
5.plot: Bellator MMA is live from Temecula, California with a Featherweight showdown between former Champ Daniel Straus and heavy handed Juston Wilcox. Rob Emerson and Rafael Silva will also clash in a Bantamweight barnburner!

6.title: Bellator MMA 128
6.plot: Bellator MMA is live from Thackerville, Oklahoma with a the Bantamweight title on the line as Champ Eduardo Dantas meets Interim Champ Joe Warren to unify the 135-pound crown! Knockout artist Michael Page returns to the Bellator cage to face the dangerous Nah-Shon Burrell!

7.title: Bellator MMA 129
7.plot: Bellator MMA is live from Council Bluffs, Iowa as the dangerous Paul Bradley takes on fellow Iowa native Josh Neer. And "The Colossus" James Thompson will meet fellow slugger Houston Alexander in a heavyweight fight sure to bring fireworks!

8.title: Bellator MMA 130
8.plot: Bellator MMA is live from Mulvane, Kansas with the Light Heavyweight Champ Emanuel Newton putting his belt on the line against Linton Vassell after a successful title defense this past September. Olympian Rick Hawn faces the tough Dave Jansen, who is riding a 6-fight winning streak. Bobby Lashley looks for a second win in Bellator against Karl Etherington.

imdb.plot outline: Bellator mma is a mma organization where young up and coming fighters face older retired ufc fighters like. Some up and coming fighters would be michael chandler some older fighters would be kimbo slice, Ken shamrock, Royce Gracie. All of these fighters look to fight their way up the ranks to be a bellator champion.
imdb.title: Bellator MMA Live
plot: Bellator mma is a mma organization where young up and coming fighters face older retired ufc fighters like. Some up and coming fighters would be michael chandler some older fighters would be kimbo slice, Ken shamrock, Royce Gracie. All of these fighters look to fight their way up the ranks to be a bellator champion.
